actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest paid on certain industrial development bonds.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income under the Internal Revenue Code the interest paid on qualified industrial development bonds if the land or property is located in a redevelopment area designated by the Secretary of Commerce under the Public Works and Economic Development Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest paid on certain industrial development bonds.
